phrases: No, I really did get a 32.
Did not we say we would show our scores at the same time?
I told you, I got a 32...
When you think about it, it is a 32.
Why would I lie about such a real score?
Let us leave it at that.
All right, I guess I cannot do anything about whether you will show me or not.
My score was bad this time too.
It is a bit shameless, but...
I will be taking a look!
What I meant to say was, it is unexpected.
Look, you forgot about your homework the day before yesterday, right?
No, no, that is not right...
You did your homework, but left it at home, right?
That is your attitude towards it.
You do not do your homework often, but you did this time, right?
You are just not very good at it.
Dreams and ambitions are like that too...
The first step is the hardest.
That is what you have done, Yukko.
You have cleared the first barrier!
You are amazing, so you may not have realised that.
Especially for an ordinary person, that is a very difficult thing to do.
In all seriousness, that is something worthy of respect!
But Mio-chan is even more amazing...
You always do your homework through force of habit.
It is just a habit of mine to always do it.
I do it by force of habit...
By comparison, you never do it.
Cars and even trains first need energy to start running.
If you think of it like that, you might be hiding an incredible power!
Little by little... little by little.
I am just an ordinary human.
I can get pretty depressed too...
No, no, you do not have to be so modest.
Everyone already knows you are amazing.
Is that what they call the will to challenge oneself?
I guess it is not a total lie...
So I got scared and could not submit it.
You get nervous a lot, do not you Mio-chan?
You only got one point, so do not you say that!
One: Give it your best effort.
That is the most important thing.
You always give it your best effort.
You have grasped the most important aspect!
I forgot the most important thing and got caught up in our scores.
Since you have already grasped that, I might have been jealous of you.
Since I am already doing my homework through habit,
I do not know whether or not I can give it my best in exams.
It is the same for my manga.
You always give it your best.
You are a breath of fresh air.
I would really love to have your positive attitude, Yukko.
Eh, but that is all I have.
But that is the most important thing, like I told you.
Well, if you say so, I guess it is true.
How did you work up the courage to take that first step?
I might say something bad though.
Anyway, you just have to avoid thinking negative thoughts.
You need to have the will to always look ahead.
Things that you can believe in are very important, and knowing that, you cannot lose.
Well, as for me, I guess it came to me subconsciously.
Or rather, that is what is natural for me.
No, it is not a talent.
I guess... that could be it.
If it comes to you subconsciously, then it is something born into you.
You cannot gain it just through trying!
I am envious of that talent.
I thought I could at least get a little of that blessing.
No, no, no, no, no, no, no!
I could not possibly give such a blessing.
You are probably spreading the blessing around already, Yukko.
They say you should try everything out.
I do not really understand it, but...
Maybe I got a little of it.
Come on, you are not going to achieve anything by praising me so much!
Did you get some of my motivation?
Yukko, your motivation is the best!
I cannot be discouraged by only getting one point.
As expected, hers was only a lukewarm Heavenly Rock Cave.
Note: In Japanese mythology, this is a reference to the cave where Amaterasu hid when angered.
If you set it up, she will bite soon enough.
Well, all I did was randomly compliment her.
I just hope she studies a bit more after this.
I turned the source of all of this into a paper plane.
If I just send this flying...
I will also fly to even greater heights.
Professor, you should have some medicine now.
Geez, you have had a runny nose since yesterday.
I told you to hurry up and go to bed, but you did not.
You will not eat properly either.
I am going to go over there and play.
I am going to get the water now, so make sure you take it.
But he said that I do not have that bad of a cold, so I do not need to take medicine.
I told you, I did not say that!
He also said he loves medicine, so he wants to drink my medicine too.
And after that, he said that no matter what you say, he likes medicine so much that he will -
If you do not, you are the one who will suffer.
But the medicine's a little bitter and I do not like it.
It will be over soon, right?
Last time, it was not over quickly.
All right, if you take this you will feel better in no time.
I wrapped it in a wafer, so there is no taste at all.
You just need to swallow it.
Ah, if you do not hurry, the wafer will melt and -
That happened because you did not swallow it right away.
I guess it cannot be helped.
When they are only hurt a little bit, they heal very quickly.
That is because we are not as cool as sharks, right?
For that reason, humans have to eat many things.
When they get sick, they have to -
Well, I will take some as well.
So please take your medicine, Professor.
It is fine if we both do it, right?
Since I cannot drink it and Nano can, I think Nano should drink it all.
If you keep this up, your cold will not get any better.
I do not care if my cold does not get any better.
Sakamoto-san, please get me a tissue.
If you wipe it there, it will get dirty, will not it?
It is not really dirty... and I am not taking the medicine!
If you are not going to take your medicine, we will go without snacks today.
He said it was okay for me to eat snacks!
You are going to blame me again?!
You are the one at fault here.
Persuading her now will be difficult.
Mix it in with her snack.
Dock it with her favourite food and camouflage it as a ride-on.
I will go and make that right away.
You will only have one chance.
If you are found out, you will not get another.
It is time for a snack.
Do you want that brat to see the medicine?!
Did not I say you only had one chance?
Anyone would have doubts about that!
You have to mix, mix and sprinkle it inside.
Sorry, I will mix it in right away.
Geez, you guys cannot do anything without me.
Really, it is a good thing I am here -
It is crunchy at first, but then it becomes more like pudding.
I guess it sometimes happens like this too.
Nano, can I have another one?
The next one's not going to be crunchy, though.
Aw, Sakamoto-san said that the crunchy pudding was better!
Shinonome Institute had another peaceful day today.
The train's due to come soon, right?
There are not as many people around in the afternoon, I suppose.
Could it be that we are alone here?
Mio-chan, that is not quite right.
It is like we have reserved it!
Let us play, let us play!
Somehow, I feel as if I am the only one losing out.
